A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Woooow. This movie is so dope. Even non lovers will enjoy this movie. No clue why the rating is so low. I left this movie kinda blown away. Great story. I thought things were gonna go in a different direction. It ended up going where you are absolutely rooting for Rey and the rebels. I thought for sure she was turning to the dark side hahaha. Overall I really feel as a Star Wars lover that this has to be top 2 in the series. Loved It.
